title: Dechert Continues Global Finance Expansion with Edward "Jay" Southgate; Brings Considerable Experience in Consumer Lending and Fintech - PR Newswire

description: /PRNewswire/ -- Dechert LLP is pleased to announce that Edward "Jay" Southgate has joined the global finance practice as an asset finance and securitization...
